original_title: Two teens drown in Dehiattakandiya; O/Level student drowns in Monaragala
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two 19-year-old youths have died after drowning in the Henanigala Wewa in Dehiattakandiya.
Police said four people were swept away by the tide when they went swimming with a group, and two of them were rescued.
In a separate incident, a 17-year-old school student drowned in the Kumbukkan Oya in Monaragala.
Police said the student was sitting for the GCE Ordinary Level examination this year.
